item.description:
A forum where developers can showcase their work and their knowledge and engage an interested group of fellow developers, partners, and potential clients.

Not to mention do a little showing off... 

If you or someone you know is working on a unique or particularly interesting project within Wordpress, come to this event and share your awesomeness with the group! 

To offer a presentation topic or for general questions feel welcome to contact me directly at jboyce@gaiaworldwide.com or 617-312-3866. 

Location: 

Still TBD. Please offer your ideas and suggestions for a suitable venue. I'm down in Mass. so its a bit harder for me to research.

Location could be anything from a room in a library to a restaurant or bar with a private room, or potentially (and perhaps ideally) someone's office. Of course, the place really needs to be connected and we have to be able to access the network.

A projector would be a very big plus as we'll need a big screen for optimum showings off. I can bring one as a last resort, but I don't think the facility managers here will appreciate my "borrowing" equipment to take off site. 

OK, so...

Send me your topics, projects or subject you want to expound to our group members. 

and...

Tell me about a great place we can meet for this thing!

 

-Joe

 

PS: My contact info again for those who are eager to offer ideas and/or have questions - but don't feel like scrolling back to the top of this message: 

jboyce@gaiaworldwide.com or 617-312-3866.

group.name: Manchester, NH WordPress Developers and Users

item.name: Wordpress Developer Talent Showcase
